name: Winter Hag
description: The Winter Hag embodies the mystique and power of winter, known for her formidable presence with a distinct streak of white hair visible even in shapeshifted forms.
memorable: Her curse allows her to manipulate and hinder those who accept her gifts, creating a challenging situation for her foes.
goals: To curse those who accept her gifts and manipulate the battlefield using her powerful spells.
relations: Often encountered with other fey or as part of winter-themed creatures.
environment: Cold regions, often amidst snow and ice.
strengths: Strong melee and ranged attacks, potent innate spellcasting, and resistance to cold damage.
weaknesses: Reliance on spells may be exploited, and she has no additional defenses against magical attacks.
attacks: Multiattack with claws dealing slashing damage and ice bolt that deals cold damage and can petrify targets.
most_powerful_ability: Curse that severely hinders those who accept her gifts, making them vulnerable to her spells.
senses: Possesses a passive perception of 16, allowing her to easily notice hidden creatures.
skills: Proficient in arcana, deception, insight, perception, and stealth, demonstrating her cunning nature.
additional_information: Can move freely through cold weather and leaves no trace on icy surfaces.
Innate spellcasting allows her to cast spells without needing material components.
Can shapeshift into a humanoid while retaining her statistics.
Can turn invisible for an hour unless she attacks or casts a spell.
Ice Shield reaction grants her extra defense against melee attacks.
spellcasting: Innate spellcaster with spells like charm person, invisibility, and control weather (extreme cold).
test_queries: cold fey spellcaster with a curse
deceptive hag that uses control weather
powerful hag known for her curses
